QuestData.Title: Instruments of Perfection
QuestData.Description:
Mikanikos is no ordinary steward. He is wise! Talented! The smartest of us all!
Also very particular!
He cannot work without his tools. The Forsworn scattered them around the forge!
You need to rebuild Crest? Retrieve his tools!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect Mikanikos's Soulsteel Clamps, Sparkling Driftglobe Core, and Gracepetal Incense Burner.
